maqras.text: Wa Law Rahimnahum Wa Kashafna Ma Bihim Min Đurrin Lalajju Fi Tughyanihim Ya`mahuna
Wa Laqad 'Akhadhnahum Bil-`Adhabi Fama Astakanu Lirabbihim Wa Ma Yatađarra`una
Hatta 'Idha Fatahna `Alayhim Babaan Dha `Adhabin Shadidin 'Idha Hum Fihi Mublisuna
Wa Huwa Al-Ladhi 'Ansha'a Lakumu As-Sam`a Wa Al-'Absara Wa Al-'Af'idata Qalilaan Ma Tashkuruna
Wa Huwa Al-Ladhi Dhara'akum Fi Al-'Arđi Wa 'Ilayhi Tuhsharuna
Wa Huwa Al-Ladhi Yuhyi Wa Yumitu Wa Lahu Akhtilafu Al-Layli Wa An-Nahari 'Afala Ta`qiluna
Bal Qalu Mithla Ma Qala Al-'Awwaluna
Qalu 'A'idha Mitna Wa Kunna Turabaan Wa `Izamaan 'A'inna Lamab`uthuna
Laqad Wu`idna Nahnu Wa 'Aba'uuna Hadha Min Qablu 'In Hadha 'Illa 'Asatiru Al-'Awwalina
Qul Limani Al-'Arđu Wa Man Fiha 'In Kuntum Ta`lamuna
Sayaquluna Lillahi Qul 'Afala Tadhakkaruna
Qul Man Rabbu As-Samawati As-Sab`i Wa Rabbu Al-`Arshi Al-`Azimi
Sayaquluna Lillahi Qul 'Afala Tattaquna
Qul Man Biyadihi Malakutu Kulli Shay'in Wa Huwa Yujiru Wa La Yujaru `Alayhi 'In Kuntum Ta`lamun
Sayaquluna Lillahi Qul Fa'anna Tusharuna
Bal 'Ataynahum Bil-Haqqi Wa 'Innahum Lakadhibuna
Ma Attakhadha Allahu Min Waladin Wa Ma Kana Ma`ahu Min 'Ilahin 'Idhaan Ladhahaba Kullu 'Ilahin Bima Khalaqa Wa La`ala Ba`đuhum `Ala Ba`đin Subhana Allahi `Amma Yasifuna
Alimi Al-Ghaybi Wa Ash-Shahadati Fata`ala `Amma Yushrikuna
Qul Rabbi 'Imma Turiyanni Ma Yu`aduna
Rabbi Fala Taj`alni Fi Al-Qawmi Az-Zalimina
Wa 'Inna `Ala 'An Nuriyaka Ma Na`iduhum Laqadiruna
Idfa` Bi-Ati Hiya 'Ahsanu As-Sayyi'ata Nahnu 'A`lamu Bima Yasifuna
Wa Qul Rabbi 'A`udhu Bika Min Hamazati Ash-Shayatini
Wa 'A`udhu Bika Rabbi 'An Yahđuruni
Hatta 'Idha Ja'a 'Ahadahumu Al-Mawtu Qala Rabbi Arji`uni
La`alli 'A`malu Salihaan Fima Taraktu Kalla 'Innaha Kalimatun Huwa Qa'iluha Wa Min Wara'ihim Barzakhun 'Ila Yawmi Yub`athuna
Fa'idha Nufikha Fi As-Suri Fala 'Ansaba Baynahum Yawma'idhin Wa La Yatasa'aluna
Faman Thaqulat Mawazinuhu Fa'ula'ika Humu Al-Muflihuna
Wa Man Khaffat Mawazinuhu Fa'ula'ika Al-Ladhina Khasiru 'Anfusahum Fi Jahannama Khaliduna
Talfahu Wujuhahumu An-Naru Wa Hum Fiha Kalihuna
Alam Takun 'Ayati Tutla `Alaykum Fakuntum Biha Tukadhibuna
Qalu Rabbana Ghalabat `Alayna Shiqwatuna Wa Kunna Qawmaan Đallina
Rabbana 'Akhrijna Minha Fa'in `Udna Fa'inna Zalimuna
Qala Akhsa'u Fiha Wa La Tukallimuni
Innahu Kana Fariqun Min `Ibadi Yaquluna Rabbana 'Amanna Faghfir Lana Wa Arhamna Wa 'Anta Khayru Ar-Rahimina
Fattakhadhtumuhum Sikhriyaan Hatta 'Ansawkum Dhikri Wa Kuntum Minhum Tađhakuna
Inni Jazaytuhumu Al-Yawma Bima Sabaru 'Annahum Humu Al-Fa'izuna
Qala Kam Labithtum Fi Al-'Arđi `Adada Sinina
Qalu Labithna Yawmaan 'Aw Ba`đa Yawmin Fas'ali Al-`Addina
Qala 'In Labithtum 'Illa Qalilaan Law 'Annakum Kuntum Ta`lamuna
Afahasibtum 'Annama Khalaqnakum `Abathaan Wa 'Annakum 'Ilayna La Turja`una
Fata`ala Allahu Al-Maliku Al-Haqqu La 'Ilaha 'Illa Huwa Rabbu Al-`Arshi Al-Karimi
Wa Man Yad`u Ma`a Allahi 'Ilahaan 'Akhara La Burhana Lahu Bihi Fa'innama Hisabuhu `Inda Rabbihi 'Innahu La Yuflihu Al-Kafiruna
Wa Qul Rabbi Aghfir Wa Arham Wa 'Anta Khayru Ar-Rahimina
